meanings.definition: A round solid figure, or its surface, with every point on its surface equidistant from its center.
meanings.sent1: The artist painted colorful spheres on the canvas.
meanings.sent2: Children played with bouncing spheres in the playground.
meanings.sent3: The magician juggled spheres of different sizes effortlessly.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter filled the room, bouncing off the walls like spheres.
meanings.sent5: The crystal ball revealed a world of swirling spheres and colors.

meanings.definition: A particular field of activity or expertise.
meanings.sent1: She excelled in the academic and scientific spheres.
meanings.sent2: In the business sphere, he was known for his innovative ideas.
meanings.sent3: The culinary sphere welcomed her unique fusion dishes.
meanings.sent4: His influence extended beyond the political sphere.
meanings.sent5: Exploring the artistic sphere allowed her creativity to flourish.

meanings.sent1: The telescope revealed distant spheres in the night sky.
meanings.sent2: Astronomers study the movement of celestial spheres.
meanings.sent3: The alien spaceship hovered silently above, resembling a glowing sphere.
meanings.sent4: The moon shone brightly among the other celestial spheres.
meanings.sent5: The shooting star streaked across the dark sphere of the sky.
